title: Mad Love - Comics Watch Face
summary: Bubble-blowing little monster Quinn, and her tic-tac laughing watch face.
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
😝“I’m known to be quite vexing, I’m just forewarning you” - Harley Quinn

Most quirky girl-supervillain of them all. To some annoying, to some adorable, this little monster is definitely one of the most memorable characters in the history of comics.

This mad, mad love...

🌟Main features:
- Unique analog and digital styles;
- Custom comics design;
- Bubble blowing & popping animation;
- Smart ambient mode.

⌚Is it for me?
Mad Love is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 and S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Mad Love Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Keep your head straight, boy 😵
And don't forget to check out our store for more fine-crafted watch faces🙊

Very different Not the usual watch face but it looks great.
Looks good Works well on a Sony smart watch 3
